Posts.Content: j1gilbe wrote: My last treatment was on 9/30/11. This was the last of all the chemo treatments for breast cancer. I have done all of them and all hormonals. I am drowning. Nobody knows what to do with me. I am so frustrated because I waited 2 months to start a MDX-1105 monochronal antibody trial, but got disqualified at the last minute. They are saying that because of my bone mets taking over, I am not producing enough blood cells. My platelets were dow to 96,000 but came up over 100,000 themselves a week later. My hemoglobin was down to 8.3 but came up to 8.6 a week later. I keep telling my Dr. that I had severe rectal bleeding from hemorrhoids for over a month and maybe thats why my counts dropped. No, they insist that I have bone marrow insufficiency. This disqualifies me for most trials. I am literally falling through the cracks. All I do is go to the doctor, get scans, over and over and still no treatment. Any advice is welcome. Dx 1/1/1999, DCIS, Stage IV, Grade 2, 4/15 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Outlived all my treatments. Drs. Don't know what to do with me! j1gilbe Lowrider54

Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2011 08:21PM j1gilbe wrote: I should also mention I have bone, liver and abdominal mets. ER/PR+ Her2-. Md Anderson is 30 minutes away and they can't even help me. My low blood counts are disqualifying me for trials. I had a transfusion last week and I am sure they are much higher now. Most trials want platelets above 100,000 and hemoglobin over 9. Sorry for the rambling.
Posts.Title: Outlived all my treatments. Drs. Don't know what to do with me! j1gilbe Lowrider54

Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2011 07:22AM j1gilbe wrote: Thanks Ladies. You are the best! I feel so much better with your support. I am against chemo at this point because of QOL issues with the blood counts. I just can't believe I am not "healthy" enough for phase 1 trials just because of my anemia. I am a 12 year survivor (9 years with mets). I live a normal life and I am active and able to keep up with others my age. A lot of my friends and none of my neighbors even know I have cancer. I had my greatest success with AI's, so I will check into the estrogen. Thanks! Jeanne in Houston (really close to MD Anderson)
Posts.Title: Outlived all my treatments. Drs. Don't know what to do with me! j1gilbe Lowrider54

Posts.Content: May 20, 2011 11:23PM j1gilbe wrote: Hi, I am Jeanne, the one who first posted about the Boswellia. I am so happy it is working for you and others. The relief for me was so tremendous I was beginning to think I was crazy. I hope more people get the same benefits as we got. Jeanne
